Html:
hi folks,

I'm adding an overlay with poly's to the map in Windows.Forms
But the new Polygons appear only after I manually zome in/out or if i call gmap.ZoomAndCenterRoutes.

i have tried gmap.Invalidate(which is async), gmap.Refresh, gmap.Update, gmap.ReloadMap, but nothing works as expected

thanks in advanced!
did someone have an suggestion for me ?

after you add the last polygon set a new possition to your map control, maybe one point in the polygon:
MapControl.Position = New PointLatLng(lat, lng).
